location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 40 of 1822 from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, at Sheraz [Shiraz] to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of the commands of the Bombay Government, dated 17 June 1822, which instructed the Resident to provide information on the number of boats taken by the Shaikh of Bushire, and whether he has paid for them.
